item.title: Palantir is one stock to own in hopes of its growing to a trillion dollar market cap, investor says
item.description: Will McGough, Prime Capital Financial director of investments, said Palantir is a buy even though the stock has rallied 55% this year.

item.title: Investors should proceed with caution when buying these corporate bonds, Wells Fargo says
item.description: The environment has changed for lower-rated investment grade corporates, says Wells Fargo. Here's what income investors should know.

item.title: This ETF is 'coiling' in advance of a breakout, says Carter Worth
item.description: The chart analysts breaks down the action in the SLV ETF.

item.title: This consumer products stock is rushing to leave China and Wall Street is betting it can pull it off
item.description: Wall Street analysts see shares of SharkNinja rising anymore between 7% and an eye-watering 91%.

item.title: Goldman Sachs says this ride-hailing stock is a buy after a strong earnings report
item.description: Analyst Eric Sheridan upgraded the ride-hailing stock to buy from neutral.
